text: @DonaldJTrumpJr Hah!  Daddy couldn't pull himself away from Faux (fox) News long enough to do anything about the coronavirus in Jan. Thought he wasn't watching the trial and was too busy "working".  Clearly he isn't able to focus on anything but himself. This is all on him.  Forever impeached.
